HEROES 23

    • {{hero.name}} , {{hero.height}}, {{hero.origin}}
      • {{skill}}
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Hero} from '../../Models/hero' import {Observable, Subscription } from 'rxjs'; import { Store, Action } from '@ngrx/store'; import * as heroActions from '../Store/heroes.actions' @Component({ selector: 'app-display', templateUrl: './display.component.html', styleUrls: ['./display.component.css'] }) export class DisplayComponent { constructor(private store: Store<{heroList: {Heroes: Hero[]}}>) {console.log("display comp init")} heroes: Hero[]; ngOnInit(): void { this.store.select('heroList').subscribe( {next : (hero) => this.heroes = hero.Heroes, error: (error) => console.log(error)} ) } ngOnDestroy(): void { console.log("destroyed display component") } }
